headline: Record Backlog Surge and Earnings Beat Could Be a Game Changer for General Dynamics (GD)
summary: General Dynamics recently reported second-quarter 2025 earnings per share of US$3.74, exceeding analyst estimates and marking a 14.7% increase year over year, while its total backlog rose to US$103.68 billion from the prior quarter’s US$88.66 billion. This backlog growth is substantial and highlights the company's reinforced revenue visibility amid continued strong demand for its aerospace and defense solutions. Let's explore how General Dynamics' record backlog increase informs its...

headline: 3 Reasons GD is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: General Dynamics’s 27.9% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 19.3%, and its stock price has climbed to $319.61 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
